QuestData.Title: Cro's Revenge
QuestData.Description: HA! The fruit vendor was so cunning, but I, Cro Threadstrong, am even MORE cunning. I have come back into the past to defeat the ogre army before that fruit vendor can turn them against me!$B$BBring me the head of a big, strong ogre from the old slag mines, and I will have crushed the fruit vendor before a single apple has even grown!$B$BCAN YOU HEAR ME, FRUIT VENDOR? I WILL HAVE MY VICTORY!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect a Giant Ogre Head from the Bloodmaul Slag Mines.
